body:
I hit Ctrl-C during a 'spack install launchmon' and now continually get the following error when I try to run launchmon:

```
$ spack install -v launchmon |& tee ~/lfile
==> WRITE LOCK: /usr/tcetmp/packages/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/prefix_lock[6216851780833950929:1] [Released]
==> WRITE LOCK: /usr/tcetmp/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/.lock[8277517891471138101:1] [Released]
==> Error: Command exited with status 2:
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
```

Removing all of the lock files and the stage directory did not resolve the issue.
title: Unable to recover WRITE LOCK after CTRL-C hit during an install
